name: JWT

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the JWT object.

methods.name: getAdditionalClaims
methods.description: Returns a map of additional claims in the JWT, where the key string contains the name of the claim, and the value contains the value of the claim.

methods.name: getAud
methods.description: Returns the audience claim that identifies the intended recipients of the JWT.

methods.name: getIss
methods.description: Returns the issuer claim that identifies the issuer of the JWT.

methods.name: getNbfClockSkew
methods.description: Returns the not before claim that identifies the time before which the JWT must not be accepted for processing, while allowing some leeway for clock skew.

methods.name: getSub
methods.description: Returns the subject claim that identifies the current user of the JWT.

methods.name: getValidityLength
methods.description: Returns the length of time that the JWT is valid, which affects the expiration claim.

methods.name: setAdditionalClaims
methods.description: Sets the additional claims in the JWT. Returned by the getAdditionalClaims() method.

methods.name: setAud
methods.description: Sets the audience claim in the JWT. Returned by the getAud() method.

methods.name: setIss
methods.description: Sets the issuer claim in the JWT. Returned by the getIss() method.

methods.name: setNbfClockSkew
methods.description: Sets the not before claim in the JWT. Returned by the getNbfClockSkew() method.

methods.name: setSub
methods.description: Sets the subject claim in the JWT. Returned by the getSub() method.

methods.name: setValidityLength
methods.description: Sets the length of time that the JWT is valid, which affects the expiration claim. Returned by the getValidityLength() method.

methods.name: toJSONString
methods.description: Generates the JSON object representation of the Claims Set as an encoded JWT payload.

description: Generates the JSON Claims Set in a JSON Web Token (JWT). The resulting
